reviews.review: Je ne recommande pas CSGO. Jeu nul a fuir, absolument. Regorgeant de cheater, vous allez perdre de précieuses heures de votre vie. La faute a qui ? La faute a Gaben.
It's CSGO, from 10 year old to 80 year olds this game is OG.
got vac baned without even playing just fkn go die steam ur vac is shit

Firstly, buy the game.

Download the game.

Join the game and play it and get rank 2.

Get in a matchmaking.

Instantly hear russians yelling and screaming and they dont speak or understand english.

Fight then die then rage.

Break your monitor or keyboard.

So, overall a great game.
fucking bullshit... cheater everywhere... but i cant stop playing it xD
